text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook Trump you need to stop worrying about your damn Twitter account and be more worried about this Coronavirus. As of Friday May 29th there are 103K deaths and that will continue to rise because you are not doing your job. You can not blame no one but yourself. It's not Obama fault.
